nodes.text: Takodana Quencher was an alcoholic beverage served at Oga's Cantina and at Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu. The cocktail was bright green in color, and was made with multiple fruits, rum, and a fruit-flavored alcohol.

The Takodana Quencher debuted as an exclusive to the Disney's Hollywood Studios version of Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge. It is served during lunch and dinner at Disney Hollywood Studio's Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo, which has no alcoholic options in Disneyland, and at Oga's Cantina in both parks. Its menu description reads, "Bacardi Dragon Berry Rum, Blue Curaçao, Simply Orange® with Pineapple, Kiwi."
